meta.title: CCSF Master Simstate
meta.notes: Regenerated from chat progress; includes engineers, TPs/CEOs, rules, boardroom flags, R1-R5 race results, and strategy logs. | Consolidated engine v2: budget+track+driver+TP+health+RE effects. | Hall_of_Fame added. | Hall_of_Fame extended to top 10. | Hall_of_Fame Race_Winners added. | Deployed: Weather, SC/VSC 2.0, Fuel&ERS, ParcFerme, MUST allocate enforced | TD-029 applied; Hard-coded weekend mode; Tyre Patch v1.0; R9-R11 patched. | R12 weekend added; CTR fix applied; FIA enforcement hardened; Williams penalised; engineers cleaned; constructors recalculated; rumours capped. | Preseason dev applied: attribute buffs mapped from allocation points (1 per 5, cap +2 per attribute). | Rumour_Mill injected & Rumors synced (cap 20). Transfer deadline policy added (R15). Williams second seat filled (Franco Colapinto). | Promoted to MASTER save. | Added Engineer_Transfer_Engine (auto mobility) and assigned Verstappen a new engineer.

Rumors: Russell to PETRONAS before summer break
Sainz swap with Tsunoda at Toyota
Albon replacement at Shell Future GP (Lawson/Vesti/Schumacher)
Ferrari board close to forcing Sainz/Tsunoda swap
Jos Verstappen seen in Alpine garage — leverage or real talks?
ExxonMobil hires Matteo Bianchi as Verstappen's new race engineer (temp synergy 7).

lap_narration: L1 Antonelli covers Verstappen; Ricciardo grabs P3 from Hamilton.
L12 Verstappen softs fade; undercut threat forms.
L16 Antonelli pits (M->H) 2.4s; rejoins ahead after undercut.
L17 Verstappen pits (S->H); angry radio about tyre deg.
L28 Sainz crashes T10; VSC deployed; Ferrari pit wall freezes, Gasly stranded.
L38 Ricciardo pits (H->M), undercuts Hamilton for P3.
L44 Russell pits (H->S), passes Hazik late with DRS.
Finish Antonelli wins by 2.1s over Verstappen.
L1 Verstappen launches; Hazik jumps Russell into T1.
L6 Russell repasses Hazik into hairpin.
L13 Verstappen pits (S->H) early; traffic risk.
L19 Antonelli pits (M->H) and rejoins ahead of Max.
L28 Safety Car: Tsunoda crash; leaders pit to (H->M).
L35 Green; Antonelli attacks Max; GP orders full deploy, Max defends.
L42 Russell passes Gasly for P5; Hazik P7 stuck behind Ferrari.
L51 Antonelli dive at hairpin, minor contact, both continue.
Finish Verstappen wins by 0.5s over Antonelli; Ricciardo P3.
L1 Leclerc holds lead; Verstappen shadows; Ricciardo covers Hamilton.
L12 Bottas taps wall at Swimming Pool; VSC deployed; Ferrari hesitate on Gasly, loses track position.
L22 Safety Car: Hulkenberg parks at Mirabeau; leaders pit, shuffle ensues.
L34 Antonelli dives Verstappen at Rascasse; light contact, no damage.
L41 Leclerc pits late, rejoins P3 behind Antonelli & Verstappen.
L58 Hazik tries Russell at Loews hairpin; forced to cut; stewards 'racing incident'.
Finish Antonelli wins; Verstappen P2; Leclerc P3.

radio_comms.line: He’s on me, talk to me on gap.
Guys… why didn’t we box under VSC?
Box now? Copy, strap me mediums.
He hit me! That’s a joke.

lap_narration: L1 Verstappen rockets on softs; Antonelli covers P2; Hamilton locks P3.
L11 Leclerc softs cook; pits early (S->H).
L17 Verstappen pits (S->M), undercut threat on Antonelli.
L24 SC: Bottas engine failure; McLaren double-stack hurts Antonelli.
L32 Hamilton undercuts Ricciardo for P3.
L42 Hazik DRS pass on Leclerc for P6.
Finish Verstappen wins by 2.5s.

radio_comms.line: Tyres feel better now, let’s go.
That timing killed us on the stack.
Nice one boys, clear air now.

lap_narration: L1 Verstappen leads; Antonelli P2; Ricciardo P3.
L8 Rain sprinkles; slicks survive.
L15 Ricciardo pits early (S->M), undercut threat on Antonelli.
L22 SC: Tsunoda crash; pit chaos. McLaren double-stack burns Piastri again.
L29 Restart: Hazik passes Russell for P5.
L38 Ricciardo dive Turn 7 on Antonelli sticks.
L50 Heavy rain: switch to Inters; Ferrari leave Gasly out one lap too long.
Finish Verstappen wins; Ricciardo P2; Antonelli P3.

radio_comms.line: Finally, the car feels hooked up here.

lap_narration: L1 Verstappen launches; Antonelli P2; Ricciardo P3.
L7 Hamilton undercuts Gasly into T1; Ferrari slow to react.
L16 Tsunoda overtakes Russell at Senna S on Ferrari debut.
L24 SC: Sainz spins into gravel; Toyota deflated.
L29 Restart: Ricciardo sends Antonelli at Descida do Lago.
L42 Hazik clears Leclerc for P7 leveraging fuel efficiency.
L53 Verstappen cruises home by 5s.
L1 Verstappen rockets; Russell jumps Ricciardo at Les Combes.
L9 Russell softs toast; early pit.
L15 SC: Hulkenberg spins at Pouhon; free stops.
L23 Ricciardo elbows Hamilton at Bus Stop; both continue.
L31 Rain sprinkles; inters gamble fizzles; Ferrari hesitates.
L39 Antonelli undercuts; side-by-side with Verstappen; Max holds.
L44 Hazik DRS pass on Gasly into Blanchimont.
Finish Verstappen by <1s over Antonelli; Ricciardo P3.

Development_Budget.policy: Parent companies assign allocation_points per team before each window opens. Points are added to base DPP for that window only.
Development_Budget.notes: Use integers. Overspend -> penalty next season. Lowest-ranked team gets chaos_boost_points.
Development_Budget.tyre_test_notes: Use to unlock extra tyre data in FP2; boosts Tyre_Impact narrative depth.

Track_Engine.mapping_policy: Known circuits are pre-tagged. New circuits default to BalancedAllRounder until mapped.

Race_Weekend_Hook.notes: Weather -> Parc Ferme -> Fuel/ERS -> Health -> Reserves -> Return nerfs -> SC/VSC -> Race Engineer effects. Run post-qualifying & post-race as needed. | Render tyre impact after Quali before race digest.

effects.pit_timing: Improves undercut/overcut success chance based on strategy_bonus and bond_score
effects.tyre_deg: Reduces effective deg using tyre_life_delta; stacks with Driver Tyre_Mgmt and Track heat
effects.restart_errors: Lower with pressure_clutch; affects SC/VSC restarts and double stacks
effects.innovation_risk: High Innovation increases upside but adds small reliability risk

Race_Engineer_Effect.hook: Apply per driver after Track PI and before random chaos.

Weather_Engine.notes: Generates temps & rain per session. Applies Wet_Skill/Composure bonuses; changes pit logic via crossover thresholds.

SC_VSC_Engine.notes: Determines SC/VSC occurrence by track type, boosted by rain. Adds pit delta randomness & unsafe release checks.

Fuel_ERS_Engine.notes: Adds fuel load strategy and ERS deploy/harvest pacing. Interacts with hot tracks and stop-start layouts.

Parc_Ferme_Engine.notes: TP Risk & Engineer Innovation increase setup gamble swings. Parc Ferme restricts changes; includes scrutineering risk.

event_structure.Lap_Event: Short narration (overtakes, pit stops, SC/VSC, crashes)

example.Lap_Event: L12 Verstappen’s softs fade; undercut threat forms.
example.Radio: Lambiase: 'Box, Max. Push now, target out-lap.'

Race_Weekend_Format.narration_style: Compact digest with radio chatter (4–6 highlights max).

Tyre_Impact_During_Weekend.notes: Show who boxed when, pace fade/gain by compound, key undercut/overcut, and tyre-focused radio.

TwistyStreet.notes: Grip & traction win; hards struggle on restarts.

HighSpeedPower.notes: Softs overheat; long straights reward low-deg.

BalancedAllRounder.notes: All-round; Medium often best race tyre.

AltitudeSpecial.notes: Cooling & fuel efficiency matter; conserve tyres.

Tyre_Analytics.notes: This module provides guidance to narration & AI calls; values are narrative weights, not strict physics.

transfer_deadline.notes: All major driver moves must be declared by R15. CRB arbitration within 1 round. Leaks hurt morale.

Midweek_Bulletin: R12: FIA enforcer enabled; PETRONAS fined €25M at R11 (50pts suspended). Russell registered. Aggressive upgrades applied (+3 ENG, +3 COOL, +2 TOP).
R12: CTR applied; Russell fully PETRONAS; Williams penalised for 2-driver breach.
R12: Spa result ingested (VER-Ant-RIC); Drivers/Constructors recalculated from season table.
R13: Williams promote Franco Colapinto to meet FIA two-driver mandate; fines remain historical only.

Clean_Transfer_Rule.notes: Atomic transfer: remove from old team, add to new team, move/clear engineer, update Drivers table, recalc FIA. Idempotent.

R16_Monza.McLaren: Antonelli win after VER DSQ; title back on.

R18_Suzuka.ExxonMobil: P2 amid strategy errors; Verstappen misses GP.
R18_Suzuka.Aramco: GP praised for P13 with Al-Qahtani.

R22_Qatar.ExxonMobil: Win with VER; title still unlikely.
R22_Qatar.McLaren: Antonelli P2; Piastri P4 first real points with GP.

R23_AbuDhabi.ExxonMobil: Win not enough; board threatens purges.
R23_AbuDhabi.PETRONAS: Podium for Hazik; solid P3 overall.

yearbook_2029.summary: Rookie Kimi Antonelli (McLaren) wins the 2029 Drivers' title. ExxonMobil take Constructors. FIA strict mode from R16 brings DSQs (VER Monza, GAS Mexico). Lambiase saga swings title narrative: leaves VER→Al-Qahtani→Piastri, nerfing ExxonMobil and reviving Piastri. PETRONAS steady with Hazik podiums. Ferrari implode internally. Alpine survive via Ricciardo. Season remembered for strict scrutineering and boardroom chaos.
highlights: Verstappen DSQ at Monza under strict FIA
Piastri resurrected by GP in final two races
Hazik podium machine; PETRONAS P3 constructors
Ferrari DSQ Mexico; internal civil war
